sentences.en: All the diverse sciences , technologies, and schools of theurgies are inconstant Dao that create integrated matters.
sentences.cn: 分类多样的科学技术和门派多样的道学法术都属于创造综合事物的非常道.

sentences.en: All these are the contents of the education of inconstant Dao.
sentences.cn: 这些都属于非常道的教育内容.

sentences.en: But now, the gap is shrinking, and China's aniline market has become complicated and inconstant.
sentences.cn: 但是现在, 这个差距正在缩小, 而且中国的苯胺市场已经成为复杂多变的.

sentences.en: Confronted with the inconstant market competition, weaknesses in business management are exposed.
sentences.cn: 面对复杂多变的市场, 企业在竞争和管理方面的薄弱环节逐渐暴露出来.

sentences.en: Inconstant surges in power on an electrical power line causing interference with sensitive electronic equipment.
sentences.cn: 在电线上的不稳定电力波浪,它干扰敏感的电子仪器.

sentences.en: Life is a dream a little less inconstant.
sentences.cn: 人生是一场稍稍不那么无常的梦而已.

sentences.en: Modern character is inconstant, divided, vacillating.
sentences.cn: 现代人的个性是无常的, 分裂的, 摇摆不定的.

sentences.en: Spiking: Inconstant surges in power on an electrical power line causing interference with sensitive electronic equipment.
sentences.cn: 电流浪行: 在电线上的不稳定电力波浪,它干扰敏感的电子仪器.

sentences.en: The characteristics of inconstant flow arisen by daily regulation of power station are summarized.
sentences.cn: 概括电站日调节非恒定流特性,提出三峡枢纽非恒定流通航水力标准.

sentences.en: The theological critique is that Homer simply depicts the gods as false, as fickle, and inconstant.
sentences.cn: 神学批评是,荷马将众神描绘成,是虚假、易变且无常。

sentences.en: Well, my friend, fortune is inconstant, as the chaplain of the regiment said.
sentences.cn: 唉, 我的朋友, 命运是变化无常的, 这是那个——那个军队里的教士说的话.

sentences.en: Youth, transient and inconstant, will bring me loneliness.
sentences.cn: 青年时期, 瞬变和无恒, 将带来我寂寞.

words.tran_cn: 变化无常的；易变的；多变的
